turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to make an order for Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a grande black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like to add milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'm sorry i can hear an echo, do you have headphones on?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, would you like to add whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and what size do you want that in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me place that order for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have a grande black and white mocha with 2% milk with whipped cream to be picked up at starbucks in daly city, ca, in westlake shopping center.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is there anything else you would like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you.
